name: Doorways - Demo
description:
DORWAYS (Demo)

Rescue your kitten from an alien force by travelling through portals masked as green doorways.

What lies ahead for our hero? Probably not much good, although that might be up to you.

(Demo only contains a small portion of features listed below.)

Some gameplay features include...

-High-speed action

-Wall running

-GIBs and gore

-Sketchbook doodles as an art style?

-Eight areas to explore

-28 hidden items

-Dynamic physics

-Original music

-Gamepad support

-Save system
